properties.description: Looking west from Arthur's Pass Village towards Lyell Peak (1828m) with ridges running south (left) towards Mt Bealey and north (right) towards Avalanche Peak. Treeline is at about 1300m.
Looking north from Arthur's Pass Village towards Arthur's Pass proper (920m) with ridges running west (left) towards Avalanche Peak and Mt Rolleston (Rome & Goldney). Treeline is at about 1300m.
